testimonials.name: Alex Sexwale
testimonials.title: LifeChoices Lecturer
testimonials.content: Nadeem is creative and naturally gifted in the tech space. He always goes the extra mile when it comes to producing quality work.

testimonials.name: Muhammad Breda
testimonials.title: Aspiring Full-Stack Dev
testimonials.content: Nadeem is very ambitious, creative and just has that eye for good design. Overall he is a great guy! Glade to have worked with him.

testimonials.name: Craig Braaf
testimonials.title: Aspiring Front-End Dev
testimonials.content: Nadeem is extremely observant and possesses a keen attention to detail. He's innovative and filled with ideas.
